sentences.sContent: When factitious what has is the meeting special brokenhearted?
sentences.sContent_eng: When factitious what has is the meeting special brokenhearted?
sentences.sCn: 人为什么有的时候会特别的没有精神呢?。

synos.tran: 人为的，人工的；不自然的；虚假的

remMethod.val: fact(做) + itious → 做出来的 → 人为的

trans.tranOther: made to happen artificially by people rather than happening naturally
